name: graphql-pair-opener
description: Automatically opens corresponding GraphQL type definitions and resolvers.

graphqlPairOpener.resolverPath.description: The workspace-relative path to your GraphQL resolver files (e.g., 'src/resolvers').

graphqlPairOpener.typeDefPath.description: The workspace-relative path to your GraphQL type definition files (e.g., 'src/schemas').

graphqlPairOpener.openInSplitView.description: If checked, the corresponding file will open in a new split-view panel. If unchecked, it will open as a new tab in the current panel.

graphqlPairOpener.usePreviewMode.description: If checked, the file will open in preview mode (italicized tab). If unchecked, it will open as a persistent tab.

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run compile
scripts.build: npm run prestest && npm run vscode:package
